pages.text: $(6)源力$(), conceptually, is basically a blend of all primal aspects, in addition to raw arcane energy itself, $(d)魔力$().$(br2)Every living soul has Magan in its core, and this Magan is manipulated to affect everything around it.

As example:$(br)if an initiate of the invisible arts would want to perform a rite that invokes the aspect of fire, the magan in their soul is distorted by the flow of the $(c)火焰$() aspect in it, causing it to emmit arcane radiation, which takes its main energy from the Mana of the soul.

This radiation will influence the field of energy (or Aura) around it, affecting it in various ways (depending on the amount of radiation and combinations of aspects).$(br2)After doing such a thing, a soul will usually need to "recharge" its Mana, by taking superfluous energy from the Aura.
